activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7295
activity.text: > Hi @aeswibon i have done changes in the frontend and its working fine, for the backend migrations I have made changes in facility.py model you can see in the figure, is it ok, how can I make migrations out of these changes. > You can use makemigrations utility from django. Read this: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.0/topics/migrations/

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7295
activity.text:
> Hi @sainak @aeswibon i want to work on the issue, if its free as the frontend part is very easy and its done should I create a pull request. For the already created data we need to change it from backend for permanent resolution should I create a pull request on backend repo.

Have assigned the issue to you. You can open the PR now...
